reviewtext: This handheld cb radio is AWSOME, it comes with a rubber intena, a car power supply for on the road use, and some packs on how to use and the rules. PROS AND CONSPros:Small,Manny Channels,able to scan the channels,Able to have different antenna attachments,10 weather channels.Cons:Only about a 2.5 mile range when lots of trees and houses are around,Antenna is a bit small for range.But all in all this radio is great!
